job_title: Service Parts Engineer II, Body Structures
job_description:
• Partner with Service Parts Engineering to perform change management activities (evaluate service impact, interchangeability, and disposition) as production designs are updated Experience with development of both aluminum and steel vehicle structures and associated joining methods (e.
• Welding, rivets, adhesives) a plus Ability to perform all duties in an office environment that may contain ambient noise and temperature fluctuations Demonstrated leadership in driving service requirements in a cross-team collaborative environment Provide input and expertise into the development of new vehicle designs to promote repairability Ability to manage multiple projects across varying geographic locations simultaneously Work with part suppliers to communicate technical requirements and address questions 1-3 years experience in part development and change management within a PLM system Knowledge of engineering software and systems as it pertains to job-related area.
• Ensure all required PLM part information attributes are accurate and up to date.

• Strong Java, DB, cloud, and automation skills.
